2021-12-05T06:31:57Z.name: Collin Morikawa
2021-12-05T06:31:57Z.height: 5 ft 9 in  '''Collin Morikawa''' (born February 6, 1997) is an American professional golfer who plays on the PGA Tour and European Tour. He began his PGA Tour career with 22 consecutive made cuts, second only to Tiger Woods' 25-cut streak. |
title: 2017 ASU Thunderbird Invitational, Northeast Amateur
2018 Wyoming Desert Intercollegiate, Querencia Cabo Collegiate, Annual Western Intercollegiate
